title: RapSheet
description: A web application that helps bands find venues and for venues to find bands! You can create your profile, views bands/venues and check out their calendar to see availability. Ready to book? Just use the contact form!

title: Eat-Da-Burger
description: A fun app that will take your burger order! Add the burger you want to order, use the 'Let's Eat' button to move it over to your Devour list. Then Devour!

title: Random Cat Employee List
description: An employee directory created as a with React application. Each of the application's UI into components, manage component state, and respond to user events.

title: Budget Tracker
description: Giving users a fast and easy way to track their money is important, but allowing them to access that information anytime is even more important. Having offline functionality is paramount to our applications success.

title: Movie Binge
description: A web application that helps you choose from a random set of movies or shows. Save movies/shows so you can watch them later on. Also, test your movie knowledge by having a go at the trivia game.

title: Note Taker
description: Need to keep track of your To-Dos? Look no further! Add, Edit and Delete notes when you need to!

title: Fitness Tracker
description: A consumer will reach their fitness goals more quickly when they track their workout progress. Having the ability to track progress gives the user an insight into activity and provides positive reinforcement for progress.
